subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Michael Vick, whose N.F.L. career was derailed by a dogfighting scandal, is again displaying the talent that made him one of the league’s most exciting players at the beginning of the decade.
snippet: Michael Vick, whose N.F.L. career was derailed by a dogfighting scandal, is again displaying the talent that made him one of the league’s most exciting players at the beginning of the decade.
